headline: Title
Please enter the news title.
alias: The news alias is a unique reference to the news item which can be called instead of its numeric ID.
author: Author
Here you can change the author of the news item.
date: Please enter the date according to the global date format.
time: Please enter the time according to the global time format.
pageTitle: Here you can add a custom meta title to overwrite the default page title.
description: Here you can add a custom meta description to overwrite the default page description.
subheadline: Here you can enter a subheadline.
teaser: The news teaser can be shown in a news list instead of the full story. A "read more …" link will be added automatically.
text: Here you can enter the news text.
addImage: Add an image to the news item.
addEnclosure: Add one or more downloadable files to the news item.
enclosure: Please choose the files you want to attach.
source: Here you can override the default redirect target.
default: By clicking the "read more …" button, visitors will be redirected to the default page of the news archive.
internal: By clicking the "read more …" button, visitors will be redirected to a page.
article: By clicking the "read more …" button, visitors will be redirected to an article.
external: By clicking the "read more …" button, visitors will be redirected to a custom URL.
jumpTo: Please choose the page to which visitors will be redirected when clicking the news item.
articleId: Please choose the article to which visitors will be redirected when clicking the news item.
cssClass: Here you can enter one or more classes.
noComments: Do not allow comments for this particular news item.
featured: Show the news item in a featured news list.
published: Make the news item publicly visible on the website.
start: Do not show the news item on the website before this day.
stop: Do not show the news item on the website on and after this day.
tstamp: Date and time of the latest revision
show: Show the details of news item ID %s
languageMain: Choose the article in the master archive equaling this article.

form: Create custom forms and store or send the submitted data
themes: Manage front end modules, style sheets, page layouts and templates
page: Set up the site structure of your website(s)
tpl_editor: Edit templates in the back end
mgroup: Manage member groups (front end user groups)
group: Manage user groups (back end user groups)
files: Manage files and folders or upload new files to the server
log: Browse the system log and analyze the activity on the website
settings: Check and optimize the Contao configuration
login: Change your personal data or set a new password
listing: List the records of any table
news: Manage news and export them as RSS or Atom feed

navigation: Generates a navigation menu from the site structure
quicknav: Generates a drop-down menu from the site structure
articlenav: Generates a pagination menu to navigate articles
sitemap: Generates a list of all pages in the site structure
personalData: Generates a form to edit a user's personal data
changePassword: Generates a form to change the password
lostPassword: Generates a form to request a new password
closeAccount: Generates a form to delete a member account
form: Adds a form to the page
search: Adds a search form to the page
articlelist: Generates a list of articles of a column
randomImage: Adds a random image to the page
html: Allows you to add custom HTML code
rssReader: Adds an RSS feed to the page
listing: Lists the records of any table
newslist: Adds a list of news items to the page
newsreader: Shows the details of a news item
newsarchive: Adds a news archive to the page
newsmenu: Generates a navigation menu to browse the news archive
changelanguage: This module allows you to switch between different language versions of a page.
